mapper.insert: insert into ceptp_user (user_id, user_name, sex, class_name, professional_title, detail, password, pro, qq,mobile, delete_flg, create_user,create_time,update_user,update_time,role,user_img) values (#{user_id}, #{user_name},#{sex},#{class_name}, #{professional_title},#{detail},encode(#{password}, 'ceptp'), #{pro},#{qq},#{mobile},0, #{create_user},now(),#{update_user},now(),#{role},#{face});
mapper.select: select user_id,user_name,sex,DECODE(`password`,'ceptp'),class_name,professional_title,detail,pro,qq,mobile,delete_flg,create_user,create_time,update_user,update_time,role,user_img from ceptp_user where user_id = #{user_id} and delete_flg = 0;

select user_id,user_name,sex,DECODE(`password`,'ceptp'),class_name,professional_title,detail,pro,qq,mobile,delete_flg,create_user,create_time,update_user,update_time,role,user_img from ceptp_user where user_id = #{username} and password=encode(#{password}, 'ceptp')
select role from ceptp_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_img from ceptp_user where user_id = #{id};
